name: Fiefdom Overthrow
description:
Fiefdom Overthrow is an addictive Procedurally Generated, Open World, Action RPG where you conquer the outposts of 24 plots of land. But first, you must take out the Templar guarding the key. The farther out you go, the more difficult each section of land becomes.

The game also includes ongoing objectives to increase your level and collectible arrows from the townspeople of each plot of land.
